actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for property improvements designed to prevent shoreline erosion caused by high water levels in the Great Lakes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers a limited income tax deduction for qualified property improvements, as defined by the Army Corps of Engineers, designed to prevent shoreline erosion caused by high water levels in the Great Lakes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction for property improvements designed to prevent shoreline erosion caused by high water levels in the Great Lakes.
